name: 1500AD
overview: The Renaissance blooms across Europe. Art, science, and exploration flourish under powerful monarchs. The New World has just been discovered, and the printing press is revolutionizing knowledge. Could you introduce electricity and change history?

Q1.text: How would you build a basic battery in Renaissance Europe?
Q1.info: Batteries store electrical energy in chemical form. Simple batteries can be created with basic materials that would have been available in the Renaissance era.

Q2.text: How would you create a simple electric motor?
Q2.info: Electric motors convert electrical energy into mechanical energy using electromagnetic principles.

choices.feedback: Perfect! This is the basic setup for a simple electric motor. The interaction between the magnetic field and electric current causes motion.
